item.title: Makeing Own Servers
item.dc:creator: @skys_shadow skys shadow
item.description:
@skys_shadow wrote:

i’m sure that made a lot of sense to him v5

anybody who has run a server before would understand that but it probably sounds like giberish to him

if your wanting to make your own server, there are plenty of good tutorials in the tutorials section. I would recommend the one by scottypipen
